entry.title: Sunday: Near blizzard. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Near blizzard ending this morning then snow and blowing snow. Snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 50 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 30 gusting to 50 this morning. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 27 this morning and minus 18 this afternoon. Forecast issued 3:00 AM MDT Sunday 9 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 13. Wind chill near minus 19. Forecast issued 3:00 AM MDT Sunday 9 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly cloudy. Temperature steady near minus 13.
